summary: Zatoichi's trek through 88 temples to atone for his violent past is interrupted as he stumbles into a village terrorized by a violent yakuza boss.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Michiyo Yasuda|Kunie Tanaka|Hisashi Igawa|Masao Mishima|Jôtarô Senba|Ryûtarô Gomi|Isao Yamagata|Saburô Date|Ryônosuke Azuma|Yôichi Funaki|Kenshiro Hara|Seishirô Hara|Takahiko Higashino|Yukio Horikita|Jun Katsumura|Kanae Kobayashi|Masako Morishita|Manabu Morita|Tokio Oki|Keiko Sono|Shôsaku Sugiyama|Takeshi Takuda|Yûsaku Terashima
title: Zatôichi umi o wataru
